casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

February, 1959

(February 5, 1959) Patrick E. Dierna, an Infant, by His Guardian ad Litem Patrick F. Dierna, Respondent, v. Rochester Transit Corporation et al., Appellants.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs. All concur. (Appeal from a judgment of Monroe Trial Term for plaintiff in a bus line negligence action. The order denied a motion for a new trial.) Present — McCum, P. J., Williams, Bastow, Goldman and Halpem, JJ.
